actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to offer lifetime leases to certain individuals leasing dwellings in the Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to offer lifetime leases to individuals who lease federally owned dwellings in the Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area if the dwellings conform to minimum health and safety standards.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to offer lifetime leases to certain individuals leasing dwellings in the Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area, and for other purposes.
